hero.title: Right rent. Right terms.
hero.subtitle: We help companies save money and reduce risks through professional management and renegotiation of lease agreements.

services.title: How It Works
services.subtitle: A seamless process from start to results

analysis.title: In-Depth Portfolio Analysis
analysis.description: We conduct a thorough analysis of your existing lease agreements and identify savings opportunities.

monitoring.title: Continuous Monitoring
monitoring.description: We monitor all termination deadlines and market conditions to ensure optimal circumstances.

negotiation.title: Professional Negotiation
negotiation.description: Our team actively negotiates to secure the best terms for your premises.

reporting.title: Transparent Reporting
reporting.description: You get continuous insight into all activities and savings through our platform.

monitoring.title: Monitoring
monitoring.description: Fixed monthly fee based on portfolio size

successFee.title: Success Fee
successFee.description: Only upon successful renegotiation or termination

startup.title: Startup Cost
startup.description: One-time fee for in-depth analysis and system integration

about.title: Expertise in Lease Optimization
about.subtitle: We are specialists with extensive experience from the real estate and lease industry

oliver.name: Oliver Emerson
oliver.title: Founder & Specialist
oliver.description: Extensive experience in property management and lease negotiation with focus on commercial premises.

andreas.name: Andreas Borgljung
andreas.title: Founder & Specialist
andreas.description: Broad experience from real estate portfolio optimization with specialized expertise in lease agreement analysis.

transparency.title: Transparent Communication
transparency.description: Full transparency in all processes and decisions

results.title: Results Focus
results.description: We get paid when you save money

expertise.title: Specialist Expertise
expertise.description: Deep knowledge in lease law and negotiation

purePlay.title: Pure-Play Specialists
purePlay.description: Unlike traditional consulting firms, we are a pure lease agreement specialist. We have no conflicts of interest - our only agenda is to optimize your lease costs and terms. By focusing exclusively on this area, we can offer the industry's best expertise and results.

performance.title: Performance-Based Compensation
performance.description: Our success fee model means we only get paid when we actually deliver results. This ensures our interests are always aligned with yours - when you win, we win.

contact.subtitle: Book a free meeting and we'll tell you more about how we can help you
